name: Custom Initial Necklace
description:
A custom initial necklace, laser cut from 2 layers of 3mm acrylic.

These necklaces are 5cm tall.

Once you have made the purchase, please let us know the initial and colours you would like (one colour for the background, and another colour for the initial).

You can either add this information to the 'notes' part of your paypal payment, or email us at hellocustomania@gmail.com including your name and 1st line of your address.

The colours available to you are:

Black, white, pink, purple, blue, turquoise, red, gold, silver, gold mirror and silver mirror.

The necklace will come on a silver plated chain by default, but you can also have this on a gold plated chain on request, just let us know!

If you have any questions, or would like to change the design of your piece, everything is fully customisable, so email us at hellocustomania@gmail.com and we can discuss your options!

name: Block Style Name Necklace
description:
A custom block style name necklace.

(Please note that not all names work well in this style as sometimes the letters turn into one solid block (e.g. if 2 M's are next to each other, you can't tell where the first one ends and the second one begins). If you would like to see an example of how your name would look, just email us at hellocustomania@gmail.com and we can do that for you!)

Laser cut from 3mm acrylic, this necklace comes in 3 sizes, small (7cm wide), medium (10cm wide) and large (15cm wide).

One word only and please limit the wording to 9 letters.

Once you have made the purchase, please let us know the name and colour you would like. You can either add this to the 'notes' part of your paypal payment, or email us at hellocustomania@gmail.com including your name and 1st line of your address.

If you have any questions, would like to change the design of your piece, or would like to get it double-stacked - everything is fully customisable, so email us at hellocustomania@gmail.com and we can discuss your options!

The colours available to you are:

Black, white, pink, purple, blue, turquoise, red, gold, silver, gold mirror and silver mirror.

The necklace will come on a silver plated chain by default, but you can also have this on a gold plated chain on request, just let us know!

options.name: Small (7cm wide) with a 16 inch chain
Small (7cm wide) with a 24 inch chain
Medium (10cm wide) with a 16 inch chain
Medium (10cm wide) with a 24 inch chain
Large (15cm wide) with a 16 inch chain
Large (15cm wide) with a 24 inch chain

name: Cursive Style Name Necklace
description:
A custom cursive style name necklace!

Laser cut from 3mm acrylic, this necklace comes in 3 sizes, small (7cm wide), medium (10cm wide) and large (15cm wide).

One word only and please limit the wording to 9 letters.
If you would like to see how your name looks in this style before you order, please email us at hellocustomania@gmail.com and we can send you a preview!

Once you have made the purchase, please let us know the name and colour you would like. You can either add this to the 'notes' part of your paypal payment, or email us at hellocustomania@gmail.com including your name and 1st line of your address.

If you have any questions, would like to change the design of your piece, or would like to get it double-stacked - everything is fully customisable, so email us at hellocustomania@gmail.com and we can discuss your options!

The colours available to you are:

Black, white, pink, purple, blue, turquoise, red, gold, silver, gold mirror and silver mirror.

The necklace will come on a silver plated chain by default, but you can also have this on a gold plated chain on request, just let us know!

description:

One word only and please limit the wording to 10 letters.

Once you have made the purchase, please let us know the name and colour you would like. You can either add this to the 'notes' part of your paypal payment, or email us at hellocustomania@gmail.com including your name and 1st line of your address.
